name: Javelina Run
description:
Controls:
Jump: Tap or click on the screen, or press the Spacebar.
Boost: When you have at least one orange stored (check the number in the bottom-left corner), tap or click on the orange button in the bottom-left, or press the F key.
Menu: Tap or click the hamburger button (☰) in the top-right, or hit the Escape key.

You can turn the music and sound effects on and off from the menu on either the starting screen, or from the in-level

Run wild and free as a javelina in the American Southwest! In Javelina Run, you play as a javelina (or peccary) who just loves to run, jump, and eat oranges. Avoid scorpions, jump over obstacles, and munch on oranges for a quick boost of speed!

Javelina Run features seven standard levels. Once you've finished Level Seven, check the level select screen for Level Infinity! This is a special procedurally-generated level that changes every time you play for a unique challenge.

The game keeps track of your best time on each level so that you can compete against yourself. Each level is one kilometer long - how long will it take your javelina to make it to the finish line?
